foods.name: Burger
foods.description: This ain't your average burger. Topped with our tangy cheddar cheese sauce, fresh lettuce, and tomato.

foods.name: Banana Blueberry French Toast
foods.description: Delicious french toast with banana and blueberry.

foods.name: Cajun Pasta
foods.description: Creole-style pasta that's guaranteed to make you sweat.

foods.name: Charcuterie Board
foods.description: Delicious assortment of locally-sourced meats, cheeses, and spreads.

foods.name: Raspberry Cheesecake
foods.description: Heavenly cheesecake with a sweet raspberry topping.

foods.name: Chicken Slammer
foods.description: Our outrageous chicken sandwich topped with pickled onions and jalapenos.

foods.name: Death by Chocolate
foods.description: Decadent chocolate pudding topped with chocolate cookies, chocolate frosting, and whipped cream.

foods.name: Pile 'O Donuts
foods.description: Delicious assortment of unique donuts. Guaranteed to please!

foods.name: Italian Meatballs
foods.description: Spiced meatballs served with a rich tomato sauce.

foods.name: Lamb Chop
foods.description: Delicious lamb chop topped with a Mango chutney.

foods.name: Mango Lassi
foods.description: Creamy Mango-flavored delight, served ice cold.

foods.name: Mojito
foods.description: A refreshing minty cocktail.

foods.name: Old Fashioned
foods.description: A classic cocktail with a twist.

foods.name: Pesto Bowtie Pasta
foods.description: Delicious whole wheat pasta topped with our zesty pesto sauce.

foods.name: BBQ Chicken Pizza
foods.description: Our homemade thin-crust pizza topped with BBQ chicken and our house cheese blend.

foods.name: Pork Chop
foods.description: Thick-cut Pork Chop with a sweet apple glaze.

foods.name: Pork Ramen
foods.description: Delicious bowl of ramen with pork and vegetables.

foods.name: Salmon Salad
foods.description: Fresh salad topped with grilled salmon, mixed vegetables, and our house vinaigrette.

foods.name: Salmon Steak
foods.description: Seared salmon steak topped with a sweet mango glaze.

foods.name: Chicken Street Tacos
foods.description: Delicious chicken tacos with a spicy mango salsa.

foods.name: Veggie Sammy
foods.description: Fresh grilled veggies on our homemade toasted sourdough.

ratings.comment: Best burger in town! The cheddar cheese sauce is amazing.
Really good burger, just a bit too spicy for me.
Perfect breakfast! The banana and blueberry combo is divine.
Great pasta, very spicy as advertised. Could use more sauce.
Love the heat! Exactly what I was looking for.
Heavenly indeed! The raspberry topping is perfect.
Very rich and decadent. Almost too much chocolate, but in a good way!
Refreshing mojito, good mint flavor. Perfect for summer.
Best pizza I've had! Thin crust is perfect and BBQ chicken is delicious.
Well-cooked salmon, the mango glaze adds a nice sweet touch.
